mapper.insert: insert into member (member_email, member_pw, member_name, member_phone, member_nickname, member_enable, member_authority, join_date, zipcode, roadaddress, detailaddress) values (#{member_email}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name}, #{member_phone}, #{member_nickname}, #{member_enable}, #{member_authority}, #{join_date}, #{zipcode}, #{roadaddress}, #{detailaddress})
